item.title: New NSF Proposal and Award Policies and Procedures Guide Becomes Effective May 20
item.description: Research Administration and Finance has announced that the National Science Foundation (NSF) has released the new Proposal & Award Policies & Procedures Guide (PAPPG) (NSF 24-1), which will be effective for proposals submitted or due on or after May 20, 2024.

item.title: Collegiate Store Announces End-of-Season Clearance Sale
item.description: The Rensselaer Collegiate Store continues its Markdown Madness with its end-of-season clearance sale! Through the end of May, select clothing and gift items are up to 50% off so the Store’s staff can clear space for new items and styles this Fall. The sale is available in-store or online; some exclusions apply.
item.author: Community

item.title: RPI Athletics Announces Let’s Go Red! Golf Outing for 2024
item.description: RPI Athletics is pleased to announce that it will host its annual Let’s Go Red! Golf Outing from 8AM to 3PM on Monday, June 3 at Normanside Country Club in Delmar, New York. You can help support RPI Athletics at this event by registering to play, becoming a sponsor, or providing auction and raffle items, so come out and support Rensselaer’s student-athletes and Athletics programs!

item.title: Winners Announced for 2024 McKinney Writing Contest at RPI
item.description:
In a ceremony that featured a reading by Pulitzer Prize winner and former U.S. Poet Laureate Tracy K. Smith, winners for the 83rd annual McKinney Writing Contest at Rensselaer were announced on April 19. The contest, which recognizes writers in the Rensselaer student community, awards prizes in both undergraduate and graduate divisions the categories of Poetry, Creative Prose and Drama, Academic Essay, and Electronic Mixed Media Using Language.
